short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fork of XKit, the extension framework for Tumblr.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fork (copy with changes) of the original XKit addon. We are not in contact with the original XKit Guy, nor do we have access to xkit.info. Follow http://new-xkit-extension.tumblr.com/ for news and information.
